entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:33 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.6°C

Humidity: 89 %

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and early this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
